room_title: Escape room "Cold Case Part 2" by Puzzles in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Puzzles was amazing. Had a group of 8 and we did the Cold Case room. Everyone had a lot of fun! Can't wait to do the next room.

room_title: Escape room "Cold Case Part 2" by Puzzles in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: We were a group of 8 and tried the Cold Case room. Wow! What an awesome experience. The story was great and the puzzles were exciting. Even our more causal players had plenty to do and the active players enjoyed the challenge. We will definitely be back to try out the Parlor Room soon!

room_title: Escape room "Cold Case Part 2" by Puzzles in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: We had a blast working on the Cold Case yesterday. This was all of our first experience with an escape room, we didn't know what to expect. We had 3 Germans with us, so they gave us a clue in German! Great touch and a great experience!

room_title: Escape room "Cold Case Part 2" by Puzzles in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: The boys and I had a lot of fun trying to solve the Cold Case! They all agreed they had a blast and would do it again! The staff was great and very responsive. Thank you for a good time! Highly recommend!
